ie.gmit.sw.ai.maze

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • ie.gmit.sw.ai.maze.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    There is a node for every space on the game board. Keeps track of what item is on a this coordinate. Also keeps track of various other things like if it's on bomb fire or was on bomb fire, or is lit up via a helper. Used for search algorithms to set parent and set visited.
    Author:
    Ronan
